=!RegDelete=

== Syntax ==
{{{
RegDelete,<HKEY>,<Section>,<Key> 
}}}
This command will delete the key you specify. It uses the same parameters as the other registry related commands with the difference that it will delete a key from the registry.

== Example: ==
{{{
RegDelete,HKLM,Build\ControlSet001\Services\VgaSave\Device0,DefaultSettings.XResolution 
}}}

 
==WB076 added:==
{{{
RegDelete,<HKEY>,<Section>
}}}
This command will delete the section you specify.

== Example: ==
{{{
RegDelete,HKLM,Build\ControlSet001\Services\VgaSave\Device0
}}}
